A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw Star Wars: The Last Jedi on a Thursday opening night showing\, and loved it! Everyone is in top form\, and Mark Hamill gives a hell of a performance\, as does the radiant Carrie Fisher. I couldn't tear my eyes away\, nor my ears. John Williams delivers\, as always\, with triumphant success. Having tried to keep my review free of spoilers\, I'll end by saying that this is honestly my favorite film of the year.
